alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 2:34PM AKST until February 03 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Bristol Bay. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to one-half mile at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain over eastern portions of Bristol Bay has started to switch back to snow as colder air is moving back into the area. Rain is still falling southeast of Egegik and Port Heiden, but from King Salmon north, rain has already switched back to snow. Precipitation will begin to taper off from west to east through late this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
